title: Privacy Policy
content: This privacy policy applies to the use of the {{appName}} application, operated in Switzerland. We comply with the revised Swiss Data Protection Act (revFADP) and, where applicable, the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
2. Data collected: We only collect the data necessary to operate the application â€“ e.g., name, email address, phone number, and, where applicable, payment information.
3. Purpose of processing: To provide our services, personalize content, communicate with users, and comply with legal obligations.
4. Cookies and local storage: We do not use tracking cookies. We use local storage or session storage in your browser to save your preferences and login status.
5. Retention: Data is retained only for as long as necessary for its intended purpose.
6. Sharing: Your data is not sold to third parties. It may be shared only with trusted partners (e.g., payment providers) when necessary for operation.
7. Rights: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict processing, and request data portability.
8. Security: We use technical and organizational measures to protect your data.
9. Changes: This policy may be updated to comply with legal requirements.
